events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon when another vehicle collided with mine at a stop sign.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident after reviewing the initial report and the nature of the incident.
An agent was assigned to your case to assist in handling the vehicle collision claim and follow up with next steps.
We acknowledge the receipt of your claim for the auto accident and will proceed with the necessary investigations shortly.
Please provide a copy of the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and your driverâ€™s license for claim processing.
All requested documents including the police report and photos of the vehicle damage have been submitted for review.
Our investigation team has begun examining the details of the collision and verifying the provided documentation.
The investigation concluded confirming that the other driver was at fault in the vehicle collision incident.
A settlement amount was proposed based on estimated repairs and damages to your vehicle following the accident.
You provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the claim handling speed and the clarity of communication.
Your claim has been officially approved for the proposed settlement amount to cover the collision damages.
The settlement payment has been issued to your account to cover the costs of the repairs on your vehicle.
The claim has been officially closed following successful payment and resolution of all outstanding issues.
Your auto accident claim file has been archived in our records for any future reference or audit purposes.
